document:
<sentence id="s1" text="LCAM1 and li>MPDZ (li>MUPP1) are the only known human gene loci associated with non-syndromic hydrocephalus.">
<sentence id="s2" text="Global li>Mpdz gene deletion or conditional inactivation in Nestin-positive cells led to formation of supratentorial hydrocephalus in the early postnatal period.">
<sentence id="s3" text="This work provides a relevant hydrocephalus mouse model and demonstrates that li>Mpdz is essential to maintain integrity of the ependyma">
